definition[0]: to stop annoying or upsetting someone
example[0]: Oh, just leave me alone, will you?
example[1]: Leave the boy alone, he can make up his own mind.
definition[1]: to go away from someone so that they are on their own
example[2]: Six-year-old Gemma had been left alone in the house.
example[3]: Leave that alone. You’ll break it.
definition[3]: to stop being involved in or trying to change a situation
example[4]: Why can’t they just leave well alone and let us concentrate on teaching?
